pullrequest.title: Launch a separate roscore before roslaunching

content.raw:
I'm still getting this error on cloudsim. When I tail the rosout.log, there's a bunch of these messages:

~~~
[ WARN] [1496811723.175096893]: Shutdown request received.
[ WARN] [1496811723.175141435]: Reason given for shutdown: [new node registered with same name]
~~~
